data.eml:eml: A review of Amblypalpus and Priscapalpus (Acari: Trombidiformes: Tenuipalpidae), including two new species of Amblypalpus from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Farzan, Sadegh, Asadi, Mahdieh, Ueckermann, Edward A., Seeman, Owen D., Beard, Jennifer J. (2013): A review of Amblypalpus and Priscapalpus (Acari: Trombidiformes: Tenuipalpidae), including two new species of Amblypalpus from Iran. Zootaxa 3716 (1): 53-64, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3716.1.4
